roleset.name: make/keep secret
roleset.note: DECLASSIFY-V NOTES: Interesting: classify takes two rolesets, but only one can be negated. (from declassify.01-v)

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: They believe technology is one of their best bets , and some Soviet officials say Moscow will even consider declassifying military know - how if the price is right .
